channel.title: PK-Heaven
channel.description:
OK. This is very little modified 317 server (not up yet), from base of ddsspeced v2. I need volunteer coders for the following things:
- Home area - Training area - Custom minigame - Shops - Quests
Credits will be given to those who do their work! Possibly if this goes well, i may host server with this client. Feel free to request screenies from anything.
ADD: Changing server name... Done! New name shall be PK-Heaven, unless someone shows up and says it's reserved :) ADD2: This topic is waiting adminstrators approval, for those who wonder it

item.title: PK-Heaven
